Class TreePopup

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement

    public class TreePopup
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
    Popup menu that contains a JTree.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TreePopup

        public TreePopup()
        Constructor with an empty tree model. This needs to also add a root node, and therefore sets getTree().setRootVisible(false).
